Description: You hurl a sphere of magical darkness at a creature. Make a ranged attack, doing ghost damage on a hit. On a hit, the ball expands and covers the creatures face, granting them a -2 to hit on any attack they make before the end of their next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
